bibl.title: Homer's Winged Words and the Papyri: Some Questions of Authenticity.
bibl.note: The use of the formula ἔπεα πτερόεντα in the light of West's new Teubner edition (based on a collation of hundreds of completely unpublished Oxyrhynchus papyri).
bibl.seg: APTHORP Michael J., Homer's Winged Words and the Papyri: Some Questions of Authenticity.
The use of the formula ἔπεα πτερόεντα in the light of West's new Teubner edition (based on a collation of hundreds of completely unpublished Oxyrhynchus papyri).
